title: Hazrat Yusuf (A.S): Qaid se Mahal Tak
author: Dr. Muhammad Tahir Jagrol
description: This book narrates the Quranic story of Prophet Yusuf (A.S) in Urdu, detailing his life from imprisonment to becoming a ruler.

title: Hazrat Yunus (A.S)
author: Aslam Rahi M.A.
description: This book delves into the life and trials of Prophet Yunus (A.S), focusing on his mission, the challenges he faced, and his miraculous experience inside the fish's belly.

title: Hazrat Adam (A.S)
author: : Kamran Azam Sohvardi
description: Published by Mushtaq Books, this work offers insights into the life and legacy of Hazrat Adam (A.S), emphasizing his role as the first prophet.
